name: Youth Organisation ALEXIS Prilep
goal:
Our mission is the social inclusion of young people with fewer opportunities in the European Union with their participation in the decision-making process for a more effective impact on tolerance and awareness of the psychological concept of society through lifelong learning.

We support young people, youth workers, and educators so that they can improve their educational and communication skills, offering them a tool to recognise their competences and participation methods at EU level with an initiative that gives them the opportunity to generate mutual support, fundamental rights, and active citizenship.
interests: Budget, Education and training, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation, Youth
euInitiatives:
• Young people and decision-makers in a dialogue;
• Active citizenship, democracy, solidarity and fundamental rights;
• Civic and democratic participation of young people at EU level;
• Equal opportunities, life perspectives and a sense of social purpose, freedom of expression and building peaceful communities.
